name: lokijs
description: Fast document oriented javascript in-memory database

scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:node
scripts.build: npm run build:lokijs && npm run build:indexedAdapter
scripts.pour:beer: echo New npm version published, one beer for you !
